conclusion: Analyze motion based on velocity-time graph to determine when particles A and B meet.
Particle A starts from rest at t = 0.
Particle B starts from rest at t = 0.
Particle B's initial velocity is v_0.
Particle A accelerates from rest to 2v_0 in the first 2t_0 seconds.
Particle A continues to accelerate to 2v_0 in the next 2t_0 seconds.
Particle A's total distance traveled is 4v_0t_0.
Particle B accelerates from rest to v_0 in the first 2t_0 seconds.
Particle B continues to accelerate to v_0 in the next 2t_0 seconds.
Particle B's total distance traveled is 2v_0t_0.
Particles A and B will meet after 4t_0 since A's distance is greater than B's.
Particles A and B meet at t = 4t_0.
